articles.title: Fitbit customers say devices unusable after update - BBC.com
articles.description: More than 100 users say new software is causing Fitbits to malfunction or stop working altogether.
articles.content:
By Tom GerkenTechnology reporter
The Fitbit Charge 5 was released in September 2021
